page.title: 05EPPLETON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our new open-plan school is the third{Eppleton school. The first, Eppleton Council school, opened in 1872, and was enlarged in 1890. This was replaced in 1928 by Eppleton Colliery County Junior Mixed, Infants and Senior Schools; over a thousand children were in this school at any one time. Falling numbers and the building of new secondary schools meant that a smaller,{purpose-built school}was needed. Building began in June 1984, and the school opened for use in April 1985. It is carpeted right through and there is superb equipment for nearly three hundred pupils. A well-equipped{community centre is attached to the school.
